name.title: Accessory Name
name.description: The name for the accessory. DO NOT CHANGE THIS VALUE after creating the accessory or it will delete your accessory and create a new one.

isDebugLoggingEnabled.title: Enable Debug Logging
isDebugLoggingEnabled.description: Whether or not debug messages are sent to Homebridge logs.

switchOneIsCreatable.title: [Switch One] Create Switch
switchOneIsCreatable.description: Whether or not to create Switch One as part of this accessory. True (this checkbox is toggled) means Switch One is added to this accessory. False (this checkbox is NOT toggled) means Switch One is NOT added to this accessory.

switchOneDefaultState.title: [Switch One] Default State Is On
switchOneDefaultState.description: The default state of the switch. True (this checkbox is toggled) is on. False (this checkbox is NOT toggled) is off. This is the initial state of the switch as well as the state the switch will revert to when the default state revert timer expires (if enabled).

switchOneDefaultStateRevertTime.title: [Switch One] Default State Revert Time (in milliseconds)
switchOneDefaultStateRevertTime.description: The number of milliseconds until the switch will revert to its default state. Set this value to 0 to immediately revert back to the default state. Set this value to -1 (or leave it empty) to disable this functionality.

switchOneIsDefaultStateRevertTimeResetta.title: [Switch One] Is Default State Revert Time Resettable
switchOneIsDefaultStateRevertTimeResetta.description: Whether or not the default state revert time will reset whenever the switch is turned on.
